Uses of Package
org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.event

  • Packages that use org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.event 
    Package Description
    org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.event
    Simple event modeling classes for the ECal event display
    org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.io
    IO backend for ECal event display
    org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.ui
    GUI for the ECal event display
  • Classes in org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.event used by org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.event 
    Class and Description
    Association
    Class Association tells the CalorimeterPanel to highlight the child crystal in the given color whenever the parent crystal is selected.
    EcalHit
    The class EcalHit is an extension of Datum that stores an energy.
  • Classes in org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.event used by org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.io 
    Class and Description
    Cluster
    The class Cluster represents a cluster center and a collection of additional hits that together form a hit cluster.
    EcalHit
    The class EcalHit is an extension of Datum that stores an energy.
  • Classes in org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.event used by org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.ui 
    Class and Description
    Association
    Class Association tells the CalorimeterPanel to highlight the child crystal in the given color whenever the parent crystal is selected.
    Cluster
    The class Cluster represents a cluster center and a collection of additional hits that together form a hit cluster.
    EcalHit
    The class EcalHit is an extension of Datum that stores an energy.
